constructor.details: cTokens, _symbols and _baseUnits have to be passed in array in the exact sequence for each param.

params._baseUnits: Smallest denomination array for underlying tokens (e.g. 1000000 for USDC)
params._ref: Contract of the Band Oracle price feed
params._symbols: CToken's underlying asset symbol array that is supported by Band

getUnderlyingPrice(address).details: Comptroller expects this format: unscaledPrice * 1e36 / base_units

returns._0: Underlying asset's price scaled by the expected format

ORACLE_DECIMALS().notice: The decimals of the retrieved price of the oracle

ORACLE_STALENESS_THRESHOLD().notice: The maximum allowed period since the latest updated data

QUOTE().notice: The default quote used for compound is USD

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the price of an underlying cToken asset in expected format by Comptroller

isPriceOracle().notice: Indicator that this is a PriceOracle contract (for inspection)

userdoc.notice: Band Price Oracle Contract returns USD value of cToken's underlying asset
